name: Compliance Product Landing
description: A landing page showcasing a compliance product with a focus on onboarding and automated processes.

atoms.name: Dark Overlay
atoms.description: Dark semi-transparent overlay for content sections.

atoms.name: Primary Button
atoms.description: Solid black button with rounded corners for primary actions.

atoms.name: Hero Heading
atoms.description: Large, bold heading for the main page title.

atoms.name: Main Navigation
atoms.description: Horizontal navigation bar with product, customer, company and resources links.
atoms.css: display: flex; justify-content: space-around; align-items: center; padding: 16px;

code.css: .container { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #F2F7F9, #FFFFFF); padding: 24px; } .dark-overlay { background-color: rgba(51, 48, 46, 0.8); border-radius: 16px; } .primary-button { background-color: #000000; color: #FFFFFF; border-radius: 9999px; padding: 12px 24px; font-weight: 500; }
code.tailwind: bg-gradient-to-b from-gray-100 to-white p-6 rounded-lg bg-black text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium

best_for: Showcasing complex products with clear value propositions
Websites requiring a professional and trustworthy aesthetic
Driving conversions through clear calls to action
avoid_for: Projects requiring a playful or informal tone
Designs needing a lot of visual clutter or animation
Applications prioritizing speed and performance over visual polish
Situations where accessibility is a primary concern (due to contrast)
